mainBoard.name: Arbalest Elite
mainBoard.originalText: {2}{W}, {T}: Arbalest Elite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Arbalest Elite doesn't untap during your next untap step.

rulings.text: If another player controls Arbalest Elite during your next untap step, the part of the effect that keeps it from untapping does nothing. It won’t try to apply during a future untap step.

If the creature is an illegal target when Arbalest Elite’s ability tries to resolve, the ability won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. Arbalest Elite will untap during its controller’s next untap step.

mainBoard.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Arbalest Elite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Arbalest Elite doesn't untap during your next untap step.

"When we of the Northern Verge claim a mount, no peasant's nag will do. It must be as strong as our virtue, and must join us of its own will."
